headline: Berkshire Hathaway 13F Filing Reveals Warren Buffett's Secret Stock
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway revealed a position in embattled healthcare giant UnitedHealth Group while showing smaller stakes in longtime holdings Apple and Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Thursday.

headline: The Coca-Cola Company Announces Participation in Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference
summary: ATLANTA, August 14, 2025--The Coca-Cola Company announced today that Henrique Braun, Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, will present at the Barclays Global Consumer Staples Conference in Boston Sept. 3 at noon ET.

headline: El Paso's Helen of Troy names Scott Uzzell, former Nike, Coca-Cola executive, as new CEO
